name: TidyFactoryReborn
title: TidyFactoryReborn
author: tsukineko45, richardasmall, TiozinNub
description:
This mod enable electrical equipments to connect other equipments directly. You don't need to put electric poles between machines to spread machines anymore.

Updated TidyFactoryRedux, by richardasmall.
Original idea and mod by tsukineko45.
